torm was a roan mare that served as the mount of Captain Halloran of the Golden Legion in the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Halloran rode Storm into battle against Akbet-Khrul and his pirates in the , during the Golden Legions campaign. In the Golden Legions expedition to Maztica in the same year, Storm was transported to the continent on the Legions ship Osprey. Storm was taken by Hallorans rival Alvarro after the latter replaced Halloran as head of the lancers following the legions arrival at Ulatos. Alvarro rode the horse into battle against the Payit and brutally rode down many Mazticans on the horse, both warriors and civilians.  During the battle, Halloran ambushed Alvarro and reclaimed Storm from him. He used the horse to rescue the Nexalan woman Erixitl from the battle. 
Later when Erixitl and Halloran were attacked by the drow Ancient One Spirali along with his hell hounds, Storm ran away, but was later recovered by Halloran. Halloran took the mare across Maztica to Nexal where the people saw a horse for the first time to their amazement. The horse was taken care of by Nexalan slaves given by Naltecona, the Revered Counselor.
